name: GromJS server-side JavaScript
short_description:
GromJS is server-side JavaScript implementation of Mozilla
SpiderMonkey interpreter.
It provides Web designers/programmers ability to use JavaScript object-based
code for creating dynamic pages/Web scripts
and interact with objects on Web server.

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: Mozilla Public License 1.0 (MPL)

Intended Audience :: by End-User Class :: End Users/Desktop
